item.title: Hello World
item.description: Thanks for visiting my site. More content coming soon.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Data Science lead, currently based in Berlin. Projects I’ve been involved in cover the full range of data science areas, including machine learning (or “AI” as it is fashionably known), product analytics, business intelligence, data engineering and so on. I’ve worked across numerous sectors and for companies ranging from high-growth startups to global corporates. You can find further details on LinkedIn. I’m particularly interested in product optimisation strategies and decision-making using data, as well as novel applications of machine learning.
